alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 12 at 2:22PM MDT until October 13 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Colorado. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
